primevc.core.states.SimpleStateMachine

type
class
implements
primevc.core.traits.IDisposable
SimpleStateMachine is another implementation of the FiniteStateMachine design-pattern but simpler. It doesn't use State objects to define the state but just uses enum values to change the currentState. Instead firing 3 signals when the state changes (exiting old state, changing states) there will be only one event, the change event.

Constructor

new(defaultState : StateType, ?currentState : StateType)

Instance Variables

change(default,null) : primevc.core.dispatcher.Signal2<StateTypeStateType>

Change event, dispatched when the state changes

current(default,setCurrent) : StateType

defaultState(default,setDefault) : StateType

Instance Methods

changeTo(toState : StateType) : Void -> Void

dispose() : Void

inline is(state : StateType) : Bool
